ema yojanawa anumatha kala shyamopali maha nikaye malwathu parshawaye athigaru maha nahimipanan wahanse athulu karaka maha sangha sabhawa eki adhikarana sanghanayaka padawiya pirinamimata katayuthu yoda atha.ee anuwa sapthambar masa 01 wana dina malwathu maha wiharayiya mangala uposathagarayedi shri sannas pathraya pirinamanu labana athara abhinawa nahimiyan piliganime ulela sapthambar masa 02 wana dina aithihasika bibila kotasara piyangalu raja maha wiharasthanayedi pawathwe.shasthrawedi wijesundara balawath bandaramaha wihara wanshika shyamopali maha nikaye malwathu maha wihara parshwaye mahanayaka thibbatuwawe shri siddhartha sumangalabhidhana maha nahimiyan pramukha sanunayaka karaka maha sangha sabhawa magin “dharma kirthi shri dhammapala sobhitha” yana gaurawa namaya sahithawa wellassa , binthanna saha madakalapu disthrikkaye pradhana adhikarana sanghanayaka, padawiya aithihasika kotasara piyangala rajamaha wiharaya, badullagammana purana wiharaya, wagama shri nandaramaya yana wiharayanhi adhipathi wagama shri saddharmalankara widyayathana piriwenhi kruthyadhikari, wishramalath piriwenpathi hitapu sahakara adhyapana adhyaksha shasana kirthi shri saddharma wibhushana adhyapana darshanawedi , sama winisuru badullagammana gunarathana swamin wahanse wetha pirinamime shasanika mahothsawaya sapthambar masa 01 wana dina paswaru 2.30 mahanuwara malwathu maha wiharayiya mangala uposathagarayedi sidu kere.ema awasthawata uuwa palath pradhana amathya shashindra kumara rajapaksha, pol sanwardhana ha janatha wathu sanwardhana amathya jagath pushpa kumara, adhyapana niyojya amathya gamini wijith wijayamuni soyisa yana mahathwaruda parlimenthu manthri wijitha berugoda saha parlimenthu manthri ranjith maddumabandara yana manthriwaru me sandaha sahabhagi wethi.sannas pathraya piliganwime ha abhinawa nayaka swamin wahanse piliganime mahothsawaya sapthambar masa 02 wana dina paswaru 2.30 maha wihara wanshika shyamopali maha nikaye malwathu wihara parshwaye anunayaka sahithya, chakrawarthi aacharya niyangoda dharma kirthi shri sangharakshitha wijithasiri anunahimiyange pradhanathwayen uuwa shyama wanshika nikaye mahanayaka mahopadhyaya shri saddharma bharathiswaracharya shasthrawedi panditha ambaewela shri somananda pragnyasarabhidhana swamin wahanse saha aithihasika mahiyangana rajamaha wiharaye bharakara dhurandara siyam maha nikaye asgiri maha wihara parshwaye jyeshta karaka sangha sabhika shasana kirthi shri sanghasobhana saddharma wagishwaracharya panditha urulawaththe dhamma rakkhitha swamin wahansege sahabhagithwayen bibila kotasara piyangala rajamaha wiharasthanayedi pawathwe.aithihasika kotasara piyangalu raja maha wiharaya, badullagammana purana wiharaya, wagama shri nandarama wiharaya yana wiharathrayadhipathi, wagama, shri dhammalankara widyayathana pariwenadhyaksha ha hitapu uuwa palath piriwen adhyaksha, shasana kirthi shri්ra saddharma wibhushana, adhyapana darshanawedi, sama winisuru, gaurawarha badullagammana gunarathana swamin wahanse wetha, shyamopaliwanshika maha nikayika malwathu parshwaye athigaurawarha mahanayaka swamindrawara pramukha sanunayaka winsad wargika karaka sangha sabhawa magin “ shri dharma kirthi shri dhammapala sobhitha “ yana gaurawanama sammuthiya sahitha wellassa , binthanna ha madakalapuwa disthrikkaye pradhana adhikarana sanghanayaka padawiya pirinama athi bawa asa mama balawath sathutata pathwimi.unwahanse waththegama shri widyadarshana piriwenin ha nape shri silananda piriwenin mulika adhyapanaya laba kalaniya wishwawidyalayen shasthrawedi upadhiya ha peradeniya wishwa widyalayen adhyapana diploma pashchath upadhiya laba gathha.daksha guruwarayeku lesa pariwenasthana diyunu karamin udara shasanika mehewarak itu kalaha.samaja mehewarata da kapa wu unwahanse, pradeshaye janathawata itukala sewaya da udaraya.unwahanse labu abhinawa thanathura thama karyayan thawaduratath shakthimathwa karagena yamata mahath rukulak wanu athayi mama wishwasa himiyan ෙsowan wuey mulu gathawama shawanaya kala pasuwaya.siwpadagathawak pawa sihi thabagatha ෙnohakiwa dubala smarana shakthiyak athiwa wisu chullapanthaka himiyanarhathwaya awebodha karegana asumaha shawakayin athara ek himinamakwimata tharam hakiyawa athiwithibuen unwahaneseeg indiya shakthiya nisiyakarawa awebodhakaregana eeta anuwa upedshanayalabadimata buduhimiyan dakwu dakshathawa nisaya.buduradun anugamanaya kala thawath upedshana kamewdedakak sandahanya.in palamu kamewdaya nam ෙnaya ththa upedshanayayi.min adahaswanuey arthayeganahara dakwiya yuthu ෙdshana bawayi.ෙdawana kamewdaya nithaththa upedshanayayi.arthaya ෙganaharadakwana lada ෙdshana ෙmahi nithaththa ෙdshana ෙlasa hadinew.buduradun wadala dahem arthaya ෙganahara wadath pahadili kala yuthu eෙse ෙnokirima ha
